name: bulbasaur
summary:
A strange seed was
planted on its
back at birth. The plant sprouts
and grows with
this POKéMON.

name: ivysaur
summary:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.

name: venusaur
summary:
The plant blooms
when it is
absorbing solar energy. It stays
on the move to
seek sunlight.

name: charmander
summary:
Obviously prefers
hot places. When
it rains, steam is said to spout
from the tip of
its tail.

name: charmeleon
summary:
When it swings
its burning tail,
it elevates the temperature to
unbearably high
levels.

name: charizard
summary:
Spits fire that
is hot enough to
melt boulders. Known to cause
forest fires
unintentionally.

name: squirtle
summary:
After birth, its
back swells and
hardens into a shell. Powerfully
sprays foam from
its mouth.

name: wartortle
summary:
Often hides in
water to stalk
unwary prey. For swimming fast, it
moves its ears to
maintain balance.

name: blastoise
summary:
A brutal POKéMON
with pressurized
water jets on its shell. They are
used for high
speed tackles.

name: caterpie
summary:
Its short feet are tipped with suction
pads that enable it to tirelessly climb
slopes and walls.

name: metapod
summary:
This POKéMON is
vulnerable to
attack while its shell is soft,
exposing its weak
and tender body.

name: butterfree
summary:
In battle, it
flaps its wings
at high speed to release highly
toxic dust into
the air.

name: weedle
summary:
Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

name: kakuna
summary:
Almost incapable
of moving, this
POKéMON can only harden its shell
to protect itself
from predators.

name: beedrill
summary:
It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and
its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: pidgey
summary:
A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

name: pidgeotto
summary:
Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.

name: pidgeot
summary:
When hunting, it
skims the surface
of water at high speed to pick off
unwary prey such
as MAGIKARP.

name: rattata
summary:
Bites anything
when it attacks.
Small and very quick, it is a
common sight in
many places.

name: raticate
summary:
It uses its whis­
kers to maintain
its balance. It apparently
slows down if
they are cut off.

name: spearow
summary:
It flaps its small wings busily to
fly. Using its beak, it searches
in grass for prey.

name: fearow
summary:
With its huge and
magnificent wings,
it can keep aloft without ever
having to land
for rest.

name: ekans
summary:
Moves silently
and stealthily.
Eats the eggs of birds, such as
PIDGEY and
SPEAROW, whole.

name: arbok
summary:
It is rumored that
the ferocious
warning markings on its belly
differ from area
to area.

name: pikachu
summary:
When several of
these POKéMON
gather, their electricity could
build and cause
lightning storms.

name: raichu
summary:
Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself
from its own high-voltage power.

name: sandshrew
summary:
Burrows deep
underground in
arid locations far from water.
It only emerges
to hunt for food.

name: sandslash
summary:
Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.

name: nidoran-f
summary:
Although small,
its venomous
barbs render this POKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.

name: nidorina
summary:
The female's horn
develops slowly.
Prefers physical attacks such as
clawing and
biting.

name: nidoqueen
summary:
Its hard scales
provide strong
protection. It uses its hefty
bulk to execute
powerful moves.

name: nidoran-m
summary:
Stiffens its ears
to sense danger.
The larger its horns, the more
powerful its
secreted venom.

name: nidorino
summary:
An aggressive
POKéMON that is
quick to attack. The horn on its
head secretes a
powerful venom.

name: nidoking
summary:
It uses its
powerful tail in
battle to smash, constrict, then
break the prey's
bones.

name: clefairy
summary:
Its magical and
cute appeal has
many admirers. It is rare and
found only in
certain areas.

name: clefable
summary:
A timid fairy
POKéMON that is
rarely seen. It will run and hide
the moment it
senses people.

name: vulpix
summary:
At the time of
birth, it has
just one tail. The tail splits
from its tip as
it grows older.

name: ninetales
summary:
Very smart and
very vengeful.
Grabbing one of its many tails
could result in a
1000-year curse.

name: jigglypuff
summary:
When its huge eyes
light up, it sings
a mysteriously soothing melody
that lulls its
enemies to sleep.

name: zubat
summary:
Forms colonies in
perpetually dark
places. Uses ultrasonic waves
to identify and
approach targets.

name: golbat
summary:
Once it strikes,
it will not stop
draining energy from the victim
even if it gets
too heavy to fly.

name: oddish
summary:
During the day,
it keeps its face
buried in the ground. At night,
it wanders around
sowing its seeds.

name: gloom
summary:
The fluid that
oozes from its
mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar
that is used to
attract prey.

name: vileplume
summary:
It has the world’s largest petals. With every step,
the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

name: paras
summary:
Burrows to suck
tree roots. The
mushrooms on its back grow by draw­
ing nutrients from
the bug host.

name: parasect
summary:
A host-parasite
pair in which the
parasite mushroom has taken over the
host bug. Prefers
damp places.

name: venonat
summary:
Lives in the
shadows of tall
trees where it eats insects. It
is attracted by
light at night.

name: venomoth
summary:
The dustlike scales covering its wings
are color-coded to indicate the kinds of
poison it has.

name: diglett
summary:
Lives about one
yard underground
where it feeds on plant roots. It
sometimes appears
above ground.

name: dugtrio
summary:
A team of DIGLETT
triplets.
It triggers huge earthquakes by
burrowing 60 miles
underground.

name: meowth
summary:
It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on
its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with
Galarian Meowth.

name: persian
summary:
Although its fur
has many admirers,
it is tough to raise as a pet
because of its
fickle meanness.

name: psyduck
summary:
While lulling its
enemies with its
vacant look, this wily POKéMON will
use psychokinetic
powers.

name: golduck
summary:
Often seen swim­
ming elegantly by
lake shores. It is often mistaken
for the Japanese
monster, Kappa.

name: mankey
summary:
Extremely quick to
anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.

name: primeape
summary:
Always furious
and tenacious to
boot. It will not abandon chasing
its quarry until
it is caught.

name: growlithe
summary:
Very protective
of its territory.
It will bark and bite to repel
intruders from
its space.

name: arcanine
summary:
A POKéMON that
has been admired
since the past for its beauty.
It runs agilely
as if on wings.

name: poliwag
summary:
Its newly grown
legs prevent it
from running. It appears to prefer
swimming than
trying to stand.

name: poliwhirl
summary:
Capable of living
in or out of
water. When out of water, it
sweats to keep
its body slimy.

name: poliwrath
summary:
An adept swimmer
at both the front
crawl and breast stroke. Easily
overtakes the best
human swimmers.

name: abra
summary:
Using its ability
to read minds, it
will identify impending danger
and TELEPORT to
safety.

name: kadabra
summary:
It emits special
alpha waves from
its body that induce headaches
just by being
close by.

name: alakazam
summary:
Its brain can out­
perform a super­
computer. Its intelligence
quotient is said
to be 5,000.

name: machop
summary:
Loves to build
its muscles.
It trains in all styles of martial
arts to become
even stronger.

name: machoke
summary:
Its muscular body
is so powerful, it
must wear a power save belt to be
able to regulate
its motions.

name: machamp
summary:
Using its heavy
muscles, it throws
powerful punches that can send the
victim clear over
the horizon.

name: bellsprout
summary:
A carnivorous
POKéMON that traps
and eats bugs. It uses its root
feet to soak up
needed moisture.

name: weepinbell
summary:
It spits out
POISONPOWDER to
immobilize the enemy and then
finishes it with
a spray of ACID.

name: victreebel
summary:
Said to live in
huge colonies
deep in jungles, although no one
has ever returned
from there.

name: tentacool
summary:
Drifts in shallow
seas. Anglers who
hook them by accident are
often punished by
its stinging acid.

name: tentacruel
summary:
The tentacles are
normally kept
short. On hunts, they are extended
to ensnare and
immobilize prey.

name: geodude
summary:
Found in fields
and mountains.
Mistaking them for boulders,
people often step
or trip on them.

name: graveler
summary:
Rolls down slopes
to move. It rolls
over any obstacle without slowing
or changing its
direction.

name: golem
summary:
Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.

name: ponyta
summary:
Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.

name: rapidash
summary:
Very competitive,
this POKéMON will
chase anything that moves fast
in the hopes of
racing it.

name: slowpoke
summary:
Incredibly slow
and dopey. It
takes 5 seconds for it to feel
pain when under
attack.

name: slowbro
summary:
The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.

name: magneton
summary:
Formed by several
MAGNEMITEs linked
together. They frequently appear
when sunspots
flare up.

name: farfetchd
summary:
The sprig of
green onions it
holds is its weapon. It is
used much like a
metal sword.

name: doduo
summary:
A bird that makes
up for its poor
flying with its fast foot speed.
Leaves giant
footprints.

name: dodrio
summary:
Uses its three
brains to execute
complex plans. While two heads
sleep, one head
stays awake.

name: seel
summary:
The protruding
horn on its head
is very hard. It is used for
bashing through
thick ice.

name: dewgong
summary:
Stores thermal
energy in its
body. Swims at a steady 8 knots
even in intensely
cold waters.

name: grimer
summary:
Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.

name: muk
summary:
Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.

name: shellder
summary:
Its hard shell
repels any kind
of attack. It is vulnerable
only when its
shell is open.

name: cloyster
summary:
When attacked, it
launches its
horns in quick volleys. Its
innards have
never been seen.

name: gastly
summary:
Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.

name: haunter
summary:
Because of its
ability to slip
through block walls, it is said
to be from an­
other dimension.

name: gengar
summary:
Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.

name: onix
summary:
As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.

name: drowzee
summary:
Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.

name: hypno
summary:
When it locks eyes
with an enemy, it
will use a mix of PSI moves such as
HYPNOSIS and
CONFUSION.

name: krabby
summary:
Its pincers are
not only powerful
weapons, they are used for balance
when walking
sideways.

name: kingler
summary:
The large pincer
has 10000 hp of
crushing power. However, its huge
size makes it
unwieldy to use.

name: voltorb
summary:
Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.

name: electrode
summary:
It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.

name: exeggcute
summary:
Often mistaken
for eggs.
When disturbed, they quickly
gather and attack
in swarms.

name: exeggutor
summary:
Legend has it that
on rare occasions,
one of its heads will drop off and
continue on as an
EXEGGCUTE.

name: cubone
summary:
Because it never
removes its skull
helmet, no one has ever seen
this POKéMON's
real face.

name: marowak
summary:
The bone it holds
is its key weapon.
It throws the bone skillfully
like a boomerang
to KO targets.

name: hitmonlee
summary:
When in a hurry,
its legs lengthen
progressively. It runs smoothly
with extra long,
loping strides.

name: hitmonchan
summary:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.

name: lickitung
summary:
Its tongue can be
extended like a
chameleon's. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it
licks enemies.

name: koffing
summary:
Because it stores
several kinds of
toxic gases in its body, it is
prone to exploding
without warning.

name: weezing
summary:
Where two kinds
of poison gases
meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a
WEEZING over many
years.

name: rhyhorn
summary:
A POKéMON with a
one-track mind.
Once it charges,  it won't stop
running until it
falls asleep.

name: rhydon
summary:
Protected by an
armor-like hide,
it is capable of living in molten
lava of 3,600
degrees.

name: chansey
summary:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

name: tangela
summary:
The whole body is
swathed with wide
vines that are similar to sea­
weed. Its vines
shake as it walks.

name: kangaskhan
summary:
The infant rarely
ventures out of
its mother's protective pouch
until it is 3
years old.

name: horsea
summary:
Known to shoot
down flying bugs
with precision blasts of ink
from the surface
of the water.

name: seadra
summary:
Capable of swim­
ming backwards by
rapidly flapping its wing-like
pectoral fins and
stout tail.

name: goldeen
summary:
Its tail fin
billows like an
elegant ballroom dress, giving it
the nickname of
the Water Queen.

name: seaking
summary:
In the autumn spawning season, they can
be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and
creeks.

name: staryu
summary:
If its body is torn, it can grow
back if the red core remains.
The core flashes at midnight.

name: starmie
summary:
Its central core
glows with the
seven colors of the rainbow. Some
people value the
core as a gem.

name: scyther
summary:
With ninja-like
agility and speed,
it can create the illusion that
there is more
than one.

name: jynx
summary:
It seductively
wiggles its hips
as it walks. It can cause people
to dance in
unison with it.

name: electabuzz
summary:
Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

name: magmar
summary:
Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

name: pinsir
summary:
If it fails to
crush the victim
in its pincers, it will swing it
around and toss
it hard.

name: tauros
summary:
When it targets
an enemy, it
charges furiously while whipping its
body with its
long tails.

name: magikarp
summary:
In the distant
past, it was
somewhat stronger than the horribly
weak descendants
that exist today.

name: gyarados
summary:
Once it begins to rampage, a
GYARADOS will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.

name: lapras
summary:
A POKéMON that
has been over­
hunted almost to extinction. It
can ferry people
across the water.

name: ditto
summary:
Capable of copying
an enemy's genetic
code to instantly transform itself
into a duplicate
of the enemy.

name: eevee
summary:
Its genetic code
is irregular.
It may mutate if it is exposed to
radiation from
element STONEs.

name: vaporeon
summary:
Lives close to
water. Its long
tail is ridged with a fin which
is often mistaken
for a mermaid's.

name: jolteon
summary:
It accumulates
negative ions in
the atmosphere to blast out 10000-
volt lightning
bolts.

name: flareon
summary:
When storing
thermal energy in
its body, its temperature could
soar to over 1600
degrees.

name: porygon
summary:
A POKéMON that
consists entirely
of programming code. Capable of
moving freely in
cyberspace.

name: omanyte
summary:
Although long
extinct, in rare
cases, it can be genetically
resurrected from
fossils.

name: omastar
summary:
A prehistoric
POKéMON that died
out when its heavy shell made
it impossible to
catch prey.

name: kabuto
summary:
A POKéMON that
was resurrected
from a fossil found in what was
once the ocean
floor eons ago.

name: kabutops
summary:
Its sleek shape is
perfect for swim­
ming. It slashes prey with its
claws and drains
the body fluids.

name: aerodactyl
summary:
A Pokémon that roamed the skies
in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are
like saw blades.

name: snorlax
summary:
Very lazy. Just
eats and sleeps.
As its rotund bulk builds, it
becomes steadily
more slothful.

name: articuno
summary:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear to doomed people who
are lost in icy
mountains.

name: zapdos
summary:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear from clouds while
dropping enormous
lightning bolts.

name: moltres
summary:
Known as the
legendary bird of
fire. Every flap of its wings
creates a dazzling
flash of flames.

name: dratini
summary:
Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.

name: dragonair
summary:
A mystical POKéMON
that exudes a
gentle aura. Has the ability
to change climate
conditions.

name: dragonite
summary:
An extremely
rarely seen
marine POKéMON. Its intelligence
is said to match
that of humans.

name: mewtwo
summary:
It was created by
a scientist after
years of horrific gene splicing and
DNA engineering
experiments.

name: mew
summary:
So rare that it
is still said to
be a mirage by many experts. Only
a few people have
seen it worldwide.

name: chikorita
summary:
A sweet aroma
gently wafts from
the leaf on its head. It is docile
and loves to soak
up the sun's rays.

name: bayleef
summary:
The scent of
spices comes from
around its neck. Somehow, sniffing
it makes you want
to fight.

name: meganium
summary:
The aroma that
rises from its
petals contains a substance that
calms aggressive
feelings.

name: cyndaquil
summary:
It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on
its back burn more vigorously.

name: quilava
summary:
Be careful if it
turns its back
during battle. It means that it will
attack with the
fire on its back.

name: typhlosion
summary:
If its rage peaks,
it becomes so hot
that anything that touches it will
instantly go
up in flames.

name: totodile
summary:
Its well-developed
jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

name: croconaw
summary:
If it loses a
fang, a new one
grows back in its place. There are
always 48 fangs
lining its mouth.

name: feraligatr
summary:
When it bites with
its massive and
powerful jaws, it shakes its head
and savagely tears
its victim up.

name: sentret
summary:
A very cautious
POKéMON, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its
surroundings.

name: furret
summary:
It makes a nest to
suit its long and
skinny body. The nest is impossible
for other POKéMON
to enter.

name: noctowl
summary:
Its eyes are
specially adapted.
They concentrate even faint light
and enable it to
see in the dark.

name: ledyba
summary:
It is very timid.
It will be afraid
to move if it is alone. But it will
be active if it is
in a group.

name: ledian
summary:
When the stars
flicker in the
night sky, it flutters about,
scattering a
glowing powder.

name: spinarak
summary:
It lies still in
the same pose for
days in its web, waiting for its
unsuspecting prey
to wander close.

name: ariados
summary:
It spins string
not only from its
rear but also from its mouth. It is
hard to tell which
end is which.

name: crobat
summary:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.

name: chinchou
summary:
Chinchou blink their shining antennae at one
another to claim their respective turf.

name: lanturn
summary:
The light it emits
is so bright that
it can illuminate the sea's surface
from a depth of
over three miles.

name: pichu
summary:
It is not yet
skilled at storing
electricity. It may send out a
jolt if amused
or startled.

name: cleffa
summary:
Because of its
unusual, star-like
silhouette, people believe that it
came here on
a meteor.

name: igglybuff
summary:
It has a very soft
body. If it starts
to roll, it will bounce all over
and be impossible
to stop.

name: togepi
summary:
The shell seems to
be filled with
joy. It is said that it will share
good luck when
treated kindly.

name: togetic
summary:
They say that it
will appear before
kindhearted, car­ ing people and
shower them with
happiness.

name: natu
summary:
Because its wings
aren't yet fully
grown, it has to hop to get around.
It is always star­
ing at something.

name: xatu
summary:
They say that it
stays still and
quiet because it is seeing both the
past and future at
the same time.

name: mareep
summary:
If static elec­
tricity builds in
its body, its fleece doubles in
volume. Touching
it will shock you.

name: flaaffy
summary:
As a result of
storing too much
electricity, it developed patches
where even downy
wool won't grow.

name: ampharos
summary:
The tail's tip
shines brightly
and can be seen from far away. It
acts as a beacon
for lost people.

name: bellossom
summary:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it
dances, its petals rub together and
make a pleasant ringing sound.

name: marill
summary:
The tip of its
tail, which con­
tains oil that is lighter than wa­
ter, lets it swim
without drowning.

name: azumarill
summary:
It lives in water virtually all day long.
Its body color and pattern act as
camouflage that makes it tough for
enemies to spot in water.

name: sudowoodo
summary:
Although it always
pretends to be a
tree, its composi­ tion appears to be
closer to a rock
than a plant.

name: politoed
summary:
If POLIWAG and
POLIWHIRL hear its
echoing cry, they respond by gather­
ing from far and
wide.

name: hoppip
summary:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

name: skiploom
summary:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

name: jumpluff
summary:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

name: aipom
summary:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

name: sunkern
summary:
It may drop out of
the sky suddenly.
If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will
violently shake
its leaves.

name: sunflora
summary:
It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.

name: yanma
summary:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win­
dows in the area.

name: wooper
summary:
This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

name: quagsire
summary:
This carefree
POKéMON has an
easy-going nature. While swimming, it
always bumps into
boat hulls.

name: espeon
summary:
It uses the fine
hair that covers
its body to sense air currents and
predict its ene­
my's actions.

name: umbreon
summary:
When agitated,
this POKéMON pro­
tects itself by spraying poisonous
sweat from its
pores.

name: murkrow
summary:
Feared and loathed
by many, it is
believed to bring misfortune to all
those who see it
at night.

name: slowking
summary:
It has incredible
intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
remains calm and
collected.

name: misdreavus
summary:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

name: unown
summary:
Their shapes look
like hieroglyphs
on ancient tab­ lets. It is said
that the two are
somehow related.

name: wobbuffet
summary:
It hates light and
shock. If attack­
ed, it inflates its body to pump
up its counter­
strike.

name: girafarig
summary:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

name: forretress
summary:
Its entire body is
shielded by a
steel-hard shell. What lurks inside
the armor is a
total mystery.

name: dunsparce
summary:
When spotted, this
POKéMON escapes
backward by furi­ ously boring into
the ground with
its tail.

name: gligar
summary:
It flies straight
at its target's
face then clamps down on the star­
tled victim to
inject poison.

name: steelix
summary:
It is thought its body transformed
as a result of iron accumulating
internally from swallowing soil.

name: snubbull
summary:
Although it looks
frightening, it is
actually kind and affectionate. It
is very popular
among women.

name: granbull
summary:
It is actually
timid and easily
spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails
about to fend off
its attacker.

name: qwilfish
summary:
To fire its poison
spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

name: scizor
summary:
It has a steel-hard body. It
intimidates foes by upraising its
eye-patterned pincers.

name: shuckle
summary:
The BERRIES it
stores in its
vase-like shell decompose and
become a gooey
liquid.

name: heracross
summary:
It is usually docile, but if it is
disturbed while sipping honey,
it chases off the intruder with its horn.

name: sneasel
summary:
Its paws conceal
sharp claws. If
attacked, it sud­ denly extends the
claws and startles
its enemy.

name: teddiursa
summary:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

name: ursaring
summary:
Although it is a
good climber, it
prefers to snap trees with its
forelegs and eat
fallen BERRIES.

name: slugma
summary:
It never sleeps.
It has to keep
moving because if it stopped, its
magma body would
cool and harden.

name: magcargo
summary:
The shell on its
back is just skin
that has cooled and hardened. It
breaks easily with
a slight touch.

name: swinub
summary:
It rubs its snout
on the ground to
find and dig up food. It sometimes
discovers hot
springs.

name: piloswine
summary:
Because the long
hair all over its
body obscures its sight, it just
keeps charging
repeatedly.

name: corsola
summary:
It continuously
sheds and grows.
The tip of its head is prized as
a treasure for its
beauty.

name: remoraid
summary:
It has superb ac­
curacy. The water
it shoots out can strike even moving
prey from more
than 300 feet.

name: octillery
summary:
It traps enemies
with its suction-
cupped tentacles then smashes them
with its rock-hard
head.

name: delibird
summary:
It carries food
all day long.
There are tales about lost people
who were saved by
the food it had.

name: mantine
summary:
As it majestically
swims, it doesn't
care if REMORAID attach to it for
scavenging its
leftovers.

name: skarmory
summary:
Its sturdy wings
look heavy, but
they are actually hollow and light,
allowing it to fly
freely in the sky.

name: houndour
summary:
It uses different
kinds of cries for
communicating with others of its kind
and for pursuing
its prey.

name: houndoom
summary:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.

name: kingdra
summary:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.

name: phanpy
summary:
It swings its long
snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.

name: donphan
summary:
It has sharp, hard
tusks and a rugged
hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough
to knock down a
house.

name: porygon2
summary:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

name: stantler
summary:
The curved antlers
subtly change the
flow of air to create a strange
space where real­
ity is distorted.

name: smeargle
summary:
A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

name: tyrogue
summary:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

name: hitmontop
summary:
If you become
enchanted by its
smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks,
you may get
drilled hard.

name: smoochum
summary:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

name: elekid
summary:
It rotates its
arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it charges up
only a little bit.

name: magby
summary:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

name: miltank
summary:
Its milk is packed
with nutrition,
making it the ultimate beverage
for the sick or
weary.

name: blissey
summary:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.

name: raikou
summary:
The rain clouds it
carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.

name: entei
summary:
Volcanoes erupt
when it barks. Un­
able to restrain its extreme power,
it races headlong
around the land.

name: larvitar
summary:
It feeds on soil.
After it has eaten
a large mountain, it will fall
asleep so it can
grow.

name: pupitar
summary:
Its shell is as
hard as sheet
rock, and it is also very strong.
Its THRASHING can
topple a mountain.

name: tyranitar
summary:
Its body can't be
harmed by any sort
of attack, so it is very eager to
make challenges
against enemies.

name: lugia
summary:
It is said that it
quietly spends its
time deep at the bottom of the sea
because its powers
are too strong.

name: ho-oh
summary:
Legends claim this
POKéMON flies the
world's skies con­ tinuously on its
magnificent seven-
colored wings.

name: celebi
summary:
This POKéMON wan­
ders across time.
Grass and trees flourish in the
forests in which
it has appeared.

name: treecko
summary:
TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom
of its feet that enable it to scale
vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes
with its thick tail.

name: grovyle
summary:
The leaves growing out of GROVYLE’s
body are convenient for camouflaging
it from enemies in the forest. This POKéMON is a master at climbing
trees in jungles.

name: sceptile
summary:
The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s body
are very sharp edged. This POKéMON is
very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe
from above or behind.

name: torchic
summary:
TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER,
following behind with unsteady
steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over
1,800 degrees F, including fireballs
that leave the foe scorched black.

name: combusken
summary:
COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and
thighs by running through fields and
mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed
and power, enabling it to dole out ten
kicks in one second.

name: blaziken
summary:
In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense
flames from its wrists and attacks foes
courageously. The stronger the foe, the more
intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.

name: mudkip
summary:
The fin on MUDKIP’s head acts as highly
sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense
movements of water and air, this POKéMON can determine what is taking
place around it without using its eyes.

name: marshtomp
summary:
The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is
enveloped by a thin, sticky film that
enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches
when the ocean tide is low.

name: swampert
summary:
SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough
power to easily drag a boulder weighing
more than a ton. This POKéMON also has powerful vision
that lets it see even in murky water.

name: poochyena
summary:
At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite
at anything that moves.
This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted.
However, it may turn tail if the prey
strikes back.

name: mightyena
summary:
MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when
it is preparing to attack. It starts to
growl deeply and then flattens its body. This POKéMON will bite savagely with its
sharply pointed fangs.

name: zigzagoon
summary:
ZIGZAGOON restlessly wanders
everywhere at all times. This POKéMON
does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything
that it happens to see.

name: linoone
summary:
LINOONE always runs full speed and only
in straight lines. If facing an obstacle,
it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by
gently curving roads.

name: wurmple
summary:
Using the spikes on its rear end,  
WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and
feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with
suction pads that allow it to cling to
glass without slipping.

name: silcoon
summary:
SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch
using silk to keep from falling. There, 
this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution.
It peers out of the silk cocoon through
a small hole.

name: beautifly
summary:
BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet
pollen of flowers. If you want to see
this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY
is sure to come looking for pollen.

name: cascoon
summary:
CASCOON makes its protective cocoon
by wrapping its body entirely with a
fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens.
This POKéMON prepares for its evolution
inside the cocoon.

name: dustox
summary:
DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light.
Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted
by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the
leaves off roadside trees for food.

name: lotad
summary:
It searches about for clean water. If it does not
drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

name: lombre
summary:
It lives at the water’s edge where it is
sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass
by day and becomes active at night.

name: ludicolo
summary:
LUDICOLO begins dancing as soon as
it hears cheerful, festive music.
This POKéMON is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking
outings.

name: seedot
summary:
SEEDOT attaches itself to a tree
branch using the top of its head.
It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch.
The more water it drinks, the glossier
this POKéMON’s body becomes.

name: nuzleaf
summary:
NUZLEAF live in densely overgrown
forests. They occasionally venture out
of the forest to startle people. This POKéMON dislikes having its long
nose pinched.

name: shiftry
summary:
It lives quietly in the deep forest.
It is said to create chilly winter
winds with the fans it holds.

name: taillow
summary:
TAILLOW courageously stands its
ground against foes, however strong
they may be. This gutsy POKéMON will remain defiant
even after a loss. On the other hand,
it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.

name: swellow
summary:
SWELLOW flies high above our heads,
making graceful arcs in the sky.
This POKéMON dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless
prey is tightly grasped by SWELLOW’s
clawed feet, preventing escape.

name: wingull
summary:
WINGULL has the habit of carrying prey
and valuables in its beak and hiding
them in all sorts of locations. This POKéMON rides the winds and flies
as if it were skating across the sky.

name: pelipper
summary:
It is a messenger of the skies,
carrying small Pokémon and
eggs to safety in its bill.

name: ralts
summary:
RALTS senses the emotions of
people using the horns on its head.
This POKéMON rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws
closer if it senses that the person has
a positive disposition.

name: kirlia
summary:
It is said that a KIRLIA that is
exposed to the positive emotions of
its TRAINER grows beautiful. This POKéMON controls psychokinetic
powers with its highly developed brain.

name: gardevoir
summary:
GARDEVOIR has the ability to read the
future. If it senses impending danger
to its TRAINER, this POKéMON is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at
full power.

name: surskit
summary:
From the tips of its feet, SURSKIT
secretes an oil that enables it to walk
on water as if it were skating. This POKéMON feeds on microscopic
organisms in ponds and lakes.

name: masquerain
summary:
MASQUERAIN intimidates enemies with
the eyelike patterns on its antennas.
This POKéMON flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even
sideways and backwards - as if it were
a helicopter.

name: shroomish
summary:
SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the dark
depths of forests. They are often
found keeping still under fallen leaves. This POKéMON feeds on compost that
is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.

name: slakoth
summary:
SLAKOTH lolls around for over twenty
hours every day. Because it moves so
little, it does not need much food. This POKéMON’s sole daily meal consists
of just three leaves.

name: vigoroth
summary:
VIGOROTH is always itching and agitated
to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t
tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This POKéMON’s stress level rises if it
can’t be moving constantly.

name: slaking
summary:
SLAKING spends all day lying down and
lolling about.
It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach,
this POKéMON reluctantly moves to
another spot.

name: nincada
summary:
NINCADA lives underground for many
years in complete darkness.
This POKéMON absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless
as it waits for evolution.

name: ninjask
summary:
NINJASK moves around at such a high
speed that it cannot be seen, even
while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this POKéMON was long
believed to be invisible.

name: shedinja
summary:
SHEDINJA’s hard body doesn’t move -
not even a twitch. In fact, its body
appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this POKéMON will
steal the spirit of anyone peering into
its hollow body from its back.

name: whismur
summary:
Normally, WHISMUR’s voice is very quiet -
it is barely audible even if one is
paying close attention. However, if this POKéMON senses danger,
it starts crying at an earsplitting
volume.

name: loudred
summary:
LOUDRED’s bellowing can completely
decimate a wood-frame house. It uses
its voice to punish its foes. This POKéMON’s round ears serve as
loudspeakers.

name: exploud
summary:
EXPLOUD triggers earthquakes with the
tremors it creates by bellowing. If this
POKéMON violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is
preparing to let loose a huge bellow.

name: makuhita
summary:
MAKUHITA is tenacious - it will keep
getting up and attacking its foe
however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this
POKéMON stores more energy in its body
for evolving.

name: hariyama
summary:
It has the habit of challenging others
without hesitation to tests of strength.
It’s been known to stand on train tracks
and stop trains using forearm thrusts.

name: azurill
summary:
A Pokémon that lives by water.
It moves quickly on land by
bouncing on its big tail.

name: nosepass
summary:
NOSEPASS’s magnetic nose is always
pointed to the north. If two of these
POKéMON meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they
are close because their magnetic noses
repel one another.

name: skitty
summary:
SKITTY has the habit of becoming
fascinated by moving objects and
chasing them around. This POKéMON is known to chase after
its own tail and become dizzy.

name: delcatty
summary:
DELCATTY prefers to live an unfettered
existence in which it can do as it
pleases at its own pace. Because this POKéMON eats and sleeps
whenever it decides, its daily routines
are completely random.

name: sableye
summary:
SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside
caverns. They are feared, however,
because these POKéMON are thought to steal the spirits of people when their
eyes burn with a sinister glow in the
darkness.

name: mawile
summary:
MAWHILE’s huge jaws are actually steel
horns that have been transformed.
Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard.
When the foe least expects it, MAWHILE
chomps it with its gaping jaws.

name: aron
summary:
This POKéMON has a body of steel.
To make its body, ARON feeds on
iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by
eating bridges and rails.

name: lairon
summary:
LAIRON tempers its steel body by
drinking highly nutritious mineral
springwater until it is bloated. This POKéMON makes its nest close to
springs of delicious water.

name: aggron
summary:
AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its
own territory. It mercilessly beats up
anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its
territory at all times.

name: meditite
summary:
MEDITITE undertakes rigorous mental
training deep in the mountains.
However, whenever it meditates, this POKéMON always loses its concentration
and focus. As a result, its training
never ends.

name: medicham
summary:
It is said that through meditation,
MEDICHAM heightens energy inside
its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by
merging itself with fields and
mountains.

name: electrike
summary:
ELECTRIKE stores electricity in its
long body hair. This POKéMON stimulates
its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs
explosive acceleration performance.

name: manectric
summary:
MANECTRIC is constantly discharging
electricity from its mane. The sparks
sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this POKéMON
creates thunderclouds.

name: plusle
summary:
PLUSLE always acts as a cheerleader
for its partners. Whenever a teammate
puts out a good effort in battle, this POKéMON shorts out its body to create
the crackling noises of sparks to show
its joy.

name: minun
summary:
MINUN is more concerned about cheering
on its partners than its own safety.
It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of
sparks to cheer on its teammates.

name: volbeat
summary:
With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits
light from its tail. It communicates with
others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light.
This POKéMON is attracted by the sweet
aroma of ILLUMISE.

name: illumise
summary:
With its sweet aroma, it guides
Volbeat to draw signs with light in
the night sky.

name: roselia
summary:
ROSELIA shoots sharp thorns as
projectiles at any opponent that tries
to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this POKéMON brings
serenity to living things.

name: gulpin
summary:
Virtually all of GULPIN’s body is its
stomach. As a result, it can swallow
something its own size. This POKéMON’s stomach contains a
special fluid that digests anything.

name: swalot
summary:
When SWALOT spots prey, it spurts out
a hideously toxic fluid from its pores
and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this
POKéMON gulps it down whole with its
cavernous mouth.

name: carvanha
summary:
CARVANHA’s strongly developed jaws
and its sharply pointed fangs pack the
destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and
sunk by this POKéMON.

name: sharpedo
summary:
Nicknamed “the bully of the sea,”
SHARPEDO is widely feared.
Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off.
Just one of these POKéMON can
thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.

name: wailmer
summary:
WAILMER’s nostrils are located above
its eyes. This playful POKéMON loves
to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body
out of its nostrils.

name: wailord
summary:
WAILORD is the largest of all identified
POKéMON up to now.
This giant POKéMON swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive
amounts of food at once with its
enormous mouth.

name: numel
summary:
NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it
doesn’t notice being hit. However, it
can’t stand hunger for even a second. This POKéMON’s body is a seething
cauldron of boiling magma.

name: camerupt
summary:
CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body.
Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses
through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this
POKéMON’s back erupt, spewing the
superheated magma.

name: torkoal
summary:
You can tell how it’s feeling by the smoke
spouting from its shell. Tremendous velocity
is a sign of good health.

name: spoink
summary:
SPOINK bounces around on its tail.
The shock of its bouncing makes its
heart pump. As a result, this POKéMON cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it
stops, its heart will stop.

name: grumpig
summary:
GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its
body to amplify its psychic power waves
for gaining total control over its foe. When this POKéMON uses its special
power, its snorting breath grows
labored.

name: trapinch
summary:
TRAPINCH’s nest is a sloped, bowl-like
pit dug in sand. This POKéMON patiently
waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength
to crush even boulders.

name: vibrava
summary:
To make prey faint, VIBRAVA generates
ultrasonic waves by vigorously making
its two wings vibrate. This POKéMON’s ultrasonic waves are so
powerful, they can bring on headaches
in people.

name: flygon
summary:
FLYGON is nicknamed “the elemental 
spirit of the desert.” Because its
flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this POKéMON is always enveloped in a
sandstorm while flying.

name: cacnea
summary:
CACNEA lives in arid locations such
as deserts. It releases a strong aroma
from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this POKéMON
shoots sharp thorns from its body to
bring the victim down.

name: cacturne
summary:
During the daytime, CACTURNE remains
unmoving so that it does not lose any
moisture to the harsh desert sun. This POKéMON becomes active at night
when the temperature drops.

name: swablu
summary:
SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that
are like cottony clouds. This POKéMON
is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and
sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.

name: altaria
summary:
ALTARIA dances and wheels through the
sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds.
By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners
experience dreamy wonderment.

name: zangoose
summary:
Memories of battling its arch-rival
SEVIPER are etched into every cell of
ZANGOOSE’s body. This POKéMON adroitly dodges attacks
with incredible agility.

name: seviper
summary:
SEVIPER shares a generations-long
feud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on its
body are evidence of vicious battles. This POKéMON attacks using its sword-
edged tail.

name: lunatone
summary:
LUNATONE was discovered at a location
where a meteorite fell. As a result, some
people theorize that this POKéMON came from space. However, no one has
been able to prove this theory so far.

name: solrock
summary:
Solar energy is the source of its power,
so it is strong during the daytime.
When it spins, its body shines.

name: barboach
summary:
BARBOACH’s sensitive whiskers serve
as a superb radar system.
This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits
for prey to come along.

name: whiscash
summary:
WHISCASH is extremely territorial.
Just one of these POKéMON will claim a
large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes
about and triggers a massive
earthquake.

name: corphish
summary:
Its hardy vitality enables it to
adapt to any environment. Its
pincers will never release prey.

name: crawdaunt
summary:
CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent
nature that compels it to challenge
other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in
ponds inhabited by this POKéMON,
making them desolate places.

name: baltoy
summary:
BALTOY moves while spinning around on
its one foot. Primitive wall paintings
depicting this POKéMON living among people were discovered in some ancient
ruins.

name: claydol
summary:
CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made
by primitive humans and brought to life
by exposure to a mysterious ray. This POKéMON moves about while
levitating.

name: lileep
summary:
LILEEP became extinct approximately
a hundred million years ago.
This ancient POKéMON attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches
approaching prey using tentacles 
shaped like flower petals.

name: cradily
summary:
CRADILY roams around the ocean floor
in search of food. This POKéMON freely
extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight
tentacles.

name: anorith
summary:
ANORITH was regenerated from a
prehistoric fossil. This primitive
POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its
two large claws.

name: armaldo
summary:
ARMALDO’s tough armor makes all attacks
bounce off. This POKéMON’s two
enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to
punch right through a steel slab.

name: feebas
summary:
FEEBAS’s fins are ragged and
tattered from the start of its life.
Because of its shoddy appearance, this POKéMON is largely ignored.
It is capable of living in both the sea
and in rivers.

name: milotic
summary:
Its lovely scales are described as
rainbow colored. They change color
depending on the viewing angle.

name: castform
summary:
CASTFORM’s appearance changes with
the weather.
This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect
its tiny body.

name: kecleon
summary:
It changes body color to blend in with
its surroundings. It also changes color if
it is happy or sad.

name: shuppet
summary:
SHUPPET is attracted by feelings
of jealousy and vindictiveness.
If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this POKéMON will appear
in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves
of that person’s home.

name: banette
summary:
BANETTE generates energy for laying
strong curses by sticking pins into its
own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful
plush doll that was thrown away.

name: duskull
summary:
DUSKULL can pass through any wall no
matter how thick it may be.
Once this POKéMON chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended
victim until the break of dawn.

name: dusclops
summary:
DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow -
there is nothing at all inside.
It is said that its body is like a black hole. This POKéMON will absorb anything
into its body, but nothing will ever come
back out.

name: tropius
summary:
The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s
neck are very popular with children.
This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for
fruit resulted in its own outgrowth
of fruit.

name: chimecho
summary:
CHIMECHO makes its cries echo
inside its hollow body. When this
POKéMON becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have
the power to knock foes flying.

name: absol
summary:
Every time ABSOL appears before people,
it is followed by a disaster such as an
earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the
disaster POKéMON.

name: wynaut
summary:
WYNAUT can always be seen with a big,
happy smile on its face. Look at its tail
to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be
slapping the ground with its tail.

name: snorunt
summary:
SNORUNT live in regions with heavy
snowfall. In seasons without snow, such
as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among
stalactites and stalagmites deep in
caverns.

name: glalie
summary:
GLALIE has a body made of rock, which it
hardens with an armor of ice.
This POKéMON has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any
shape it desires.

name: spheal
summary:
SPHEAL is much faster rolling than 
walking to get around. When groups of
this POKéMON eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this,
their mealtimes are noisy.

name: sealeo
summary:
SEALEO has the habit of always juggling
on the tip of its nose anything it sees
for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains
itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL
on its nose.

name: walrein
summary:
It swims through icy seas while shattering
ice floes with its large tusks. It is
protected by its thick blubber.

name: clamperl
summary:
CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good
for protection - it is also used for
clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be
scored with nicks and scratches all
over.

name: huntail
summary:
HUNTAIL’s presence went unnoticed by
people for a long time because it lives
at extreme depths in the sea. This POKéMON’s eyes can see clearly
even in the murky dark depths of the
ocean.

name: relicanth
summary:
RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that
existed for a hundred million years
without ever changing its form. This ancient POKéMON feeds on
microscopic organisms with its
toothless mouth.

name: luvdisc
summary:
LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the
tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON
earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the
ocean’s waves.

name: bagon
summary:
Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping
off cliffs every day.

name: shelgon
summary:
Inside SHELGON’s armor-like shell, cells
are in the midst of transformation
to create an entirely new body. This POKéMON’s shell is extremely heavy,
making its movements sluggish.

name: salamence
summary:
SALAMENCE came about as a result of a
strong, long-held dream of growing
wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in
this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to
sprout its magnificent wings.

name: beldum
summary:
Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic
force courses throughout BELDUM’s
body. This POKéMON communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of
magnetism.

name: metang
summary:
When two BELDUM fuse together, METANG
is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are
joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically,
this POKéMON generates strong
psychokinetic power.

name: metagross
summary:
METAGROSS has four brains in total.
Combined, the four brains can breeze
through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer.
This POKéMON can float in the air by
tucking in its four legs.

name: regirock
summary:
Its entire body is made of rock.
If any part chips off in battle, it
attaches rocks to repair itself.

name: regice
summary:
REGICE’s body was made during an ice
age. The deep-frozen body can’t be
melted, even by fire. This POKéMON controls frigid air of
minus 328 degrees F.

name: registeel
summary:
REGISTEEL has a body that is harder
than any kind of metal.
Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this POKéMON
eats.

name: latias
summary:
LATIAS is highly sensitive to the
emotions of people. If it senses any
hostility, this POKéMON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries
shrilly to intimidate the foe.

name: latios
summary:
LATIOS has the ability to make its foe
see an image of what it has seen or
imagines in its head. This POKéMON is intelligent and
understands human speech.

name: kyogre
summary:
KYOGRE has the power to create massive
rain clouds that cover the entire sky
and bring about torrential downpours. This POKéMON saved people who were
suffering from droughts.

name: groudon
summary:
GROUDON has long been described in 
mythology as the POKéMON that raised
lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a
cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.

name: rayquaza
summary:
RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions
of years in the earth’s ozone layer, 
never descending to the ground. This POKéMON appears to feed on water
and particles in the atmosphere.

name: jirachi
summary:
A legend states that JIRACHI will make
true any wish that is written on notes
attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKéMON senses danger, it will
fight without awakening.

name: turtwig
summary:
Made from soil, the shell on its
back hardens when it drinks water.
It lives along lakes.

name: grotle
summary:
It knows where pure water wells
up. It carries fellow Pokémon there
on its back.

name: torterra
summary:
Small Pokémon occasionally gather
on its unmoving back to begin
building their nests.

name: chimchar
summary:
It agilely scales sheer cliffs to
live atop craggy mountains. Its
fire is put out when it sleeps.

name: monferno
summary:
To intimidate attackers, it
stretches the fire on its tail
to make itself appear bigger.

name: infernape
summary:
It uses a special kind of martial
arts involving all its limbs.
Its fire never goes out.

name: piplup
summary:
Because it is very proud, it hates
accepting food from people. Its
thick down guards it from cold.

name: prinplup
summary:
It lives alone, away from others.
Apparently, every one of them
believes it is the most important.

name: empoleon
summary:
The three horns that extend from
its beak attest to its power. The
leader has the biggest horns.

name: starly
summary:
They flock in great numbers.
Though small, they flap their
wings with great power.

name: staravia
summary:
It flies around forests and fields
in search of bug Pokémon.
It stays within a huge flock.

name: staraptor
summary:
It has a savage nature. It will
courageously challenge foes that
are much larger.

name: bidoof
summary:
With nerves of steel, nothing can
perturb it. It is more agile and
active than it appears.

name: bibarel
summary:
It makes its nest by damming
streams with bark and mud. It is
known as an industrious worker.

name: kricketot
summary:
It shakes its head back to front,
causing its antennae to hit each
other and sound like a xylophone.

name: kricketune
summary:
It crosses its knifelike arms in
front of its chest when it cries.
It can compose melodies ad lib.

name: shinx
summary:
All of its fur dazzles if danger is
sensed. It flees while the foe is
momentarily blinded.

name: luxio
summary:
Its claws loose electricity with
enough amperage to cause fainting.
They live in small groups.

name: luxray
summary:
It has eyes that can see through
anything. It spots and captures
prey hiding behind objects.

name: budew
summary:
Over the winter, it closes its bud
and endures the cold. In spring,
the bud opens and releases pollen.

name: roserade
summary:
It attracts prey with a sweet
aroma, then downs it with
thorny whips hidden in its arms.

name: cranidos
summary:
It lived in jungles around 100
million years ago. Its skull is as
hard as iron.

name: shieldon
summary:
A Pokémon that lived in jungles
around 100 million years ago. Its
facial hide is extremely hard.

name: bastiodon
summary:
Any frontal attack is repulsed.
It is a docile Pokémon that
feeds on grass and berries.

name: burmy
summary:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry
winds, it covers itself with a cloak
made of twigs and leaves.

name: mothim
summary:
It loves the honey of flowers
and steals honey collected by
COMBEE.

name: combee
summary:
A Pokémon formed by three others.
It busily carries sweet floral
honey to VESPIQUEN.

name: vespiquen
summary:
Its abdomen is a honeycomb for
grubs. It raises its grubs on
honey collected by COMBEE.

name: pachirisu
summary:
It makes fur balls that crackle
with static electricity. It stores
them with berries in tree holes.

name: buizel
summary:
It has a flotation sac that is
like an inflatable collar. It floats
on water with its head out.

name: floatzel
summary:
It floats using its well-developed
flotation sac. It assists in the
rescues of drowning people.

name: cherubi
summary:
The small ball holds the nutrients
needed for evolution. Apparently,
it is very sweet and tasty.

name: cherrim
summary:
It blooms during times of strong
sunlight. It tries to make up for
everything it endured as a bud.

name: shellos
summary:
Its colors and shapes differ from
region to region. In the Sinnoh
region, two types are confirmed.

name: gastrodon
summary:
It has a pliable body without any
bones. If any part of its body is
torn off, it grows right back.

name: ambipom
summary:
To eat, it deftly shucks nuts
with its two tails. It rarely uses
its arms now.

name: drifloon
summary:
A Pokémon formed by the spirits
of people and Pokémon. It loves
damp, humid seasons.

name: drifblim
summary:
At dusk, swarms of them are
carried aloft on winds. When
noticed, they suddenly vanish.

name: buneary
summary:
It slams foes by sharply uncoiling
its rolled ears. It stings enough
to make a grown-up cry in pain.

name: lopunny
summary:
An extremely cautious Pokémon.
It cloaks its body with its fluffy
ear fur when it senses danger.

name: mismagius
summary:
Its cries sound like incantations.
Those hearing it are tormented
by headaches and hallucinations.

name: honchkrow
summary:
Becoming active at night, it is
known to swarm with numerous
MURKROW in tow.

name: glameow
summary:
It claws if displeased and purrs
when affectionate. Its fickleness
is very popular among some.

name: purugly
summary:
It is a brazen brute that barges
its way into another Pokémon’s
nest and claims it as its own.

name: chingling
summary:
It emits cries by agitating an orb
at the back of its throat.
It moves with flouncing hops.

name: stunky
summary:
It protects itself by spraying a
noxious fluid from its rear. The
stench lingers for 24 hours.

name: skuntank
summary:
It sprays a vile-smelling fluid
from the tip of its tail to attack.
Its range is over 160 feet.

name: bronzor
summary:
Implements shaped like it were
discovered in ancient tombs. It is
unknown if they are related.

name: bronzong
summary:
One caused a news sensation when
it was dug up at a construction
site after a 2,000-year sleep.

name: bonsly
summary:
It looks as if it is always crying.
It is actually adjusting its body’s
fluid levels by eliminating excess.

name: mime-jr
summary:
It habitually mimics foes. Once
mimicked, the foe cannot take its
eyes off this Pokémon.

name: happiny
summary:
It loves round white things.
It carries an egg-shaped rock in
imitation of CHANSEY.

name: chatot
summary:
It can learn and speak human
words. If they gather, they all
learn the same saying.

name: spiritomb
summary:
A Pokémon that was formed by 108
spirits. It is bound to a fissure
in an odd keystone.

name: gible
summary:
It nests in small, horizontal holes
in cave walls. It pounces to catch
prey that stray too close.

name: gabite
summary:
There is a long-held belief that
medicine made from its scales will
heal even incurable illnesses.

name: garchomp
summary:
When it folds up its body and
extends its wings, it looks like a
jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

name: munchlax
summary:
It wolfs down its weight in food
once a day, swallowing food whole
with almost no chewing.

name: riolu
summary:
The aura that emanates from its
body intensifies to alert others
if it is afraid or sad.

name: lucario
summary:
It has the ability to sense the
auras of all things.
It understands human speech.

name: hippopotas
summary:
It lives in arid places. Instead
of perspiration, it expels grainy
sand from its body.

name: skorupi
summary:
It grips prey with its tail claws
and injects poison. It tenaciously
hangs on until the poison takes.

name: drapion
summary:
It has the power in its clawed
arms to make scrap of a car. The
tips of its claws release poison.

name: croagunk
summary:
Its cheeks hold poison sacs.
It tries to catch foes off guard
to jab them with toxic fingers.

name: toxicroak
summary:
Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin
so vile that even a scratch could
prove fatal.

name: carnivine
summary:
It attracts prey with its sweet-
smelling saliva, then chomps down.
It takes a whole day to eat prey.

name: finneon
summary:
After long exposure to sunlight,
the patterns on its tail fins shine
vividly when darkness arrives.

name: lumineon
summary:
It lives on the deep-sea floor.
It attracts prey by flashing the
patterns on its four tail fins.

name: mantyke
summary:
A friendly Pokémon that captures
the subtle flows of seawater using
its two antennae.

name: snover
summary:
It lives on snowy mountains.
Having had little contact with
humans, it is boldly inquisitive.

name: abomasnow
summary:
It whips up blizzards in mountains
that are always buried in snow.
It is the abominable snowman.

name: weavile
summary:
They live in cold regions, forming
groups of four or five that hunt
prey with impressive coordination.

name: magnezone
summary:
It evolved from exposure to a
special magnetic field.
Three units generate magnetism.

name: lickilicky
summary:
It wraps things with its extensible
tongue. Getting too close to it
will leave you soaked with drool.

name: rhyperior
summary:
It puts rocks in holes in its palms
and uses its muscles to shoot them.
GEODUDE are shot at rare times.

name: tangrowth
summary:
It ensnares prey by extending
arms made of vines. Losing arms to
predators does not trouble it.

name: electivire
summary:
As its electric charge amplifies,
blue sparks begin to crackle between
its horns.

name: magmortar
summary:
It blasts fireballs of over 3,600
degrees F from the ends of its
arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

name: togekiss
summary:
It will never appear where there
is strife. Its sightings have
become rare recently.

name: yanmega
summary:
By churning its wings, it creates
shock waves that inflict critical
internal injuries to foes.

name: leafeon
summary:
Just like a plant, it uses
photosynthesis. As a result, it is
always enveloped in clear air.

name: glaceon
summary:
As a protective technique, it can
completely freeze its fur to make
its hairs stand like needles.

name: gliscor
summary:
It observes prey while hanging
inverted from branches. When the
chance presents itself, it swoops!

name: mamoswine
summary:
Its impressive tusks are made of
ice. The population thinned when it
turned warm after the ice age.

name: porygon-z
summary:
Additional software was installed
to make it a better Pokémon.
It began acting oddly, however.

name: gallade
summary:
A master of courtesy and
swordsmanship, it fights using
extending swords on its elbows.

name: probopass
summary:
It freely controls three small
units called Mini-Noses using
magnetic force.

name: dusknoir
summary:
The antenna on its head captures
radio waves from the world of spirits
that command it to take people there.

name: froslass
summary:
It freezes foes with an icy breath
nearly -60 degrees F. What seems
to be its body is actually hollow.

name: rotom
summary:
Its body is composed of plasma. It
is known to infiltrate electronic
devices and wreak havoc.

name: uxie
summary:
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.”
It is said that it can wipe out the
memory of those who see its eyes.

name: mesprit
summary:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.”
It taught humans the nobility of
sorrow, pain, and joy.

name: azelf
summary:
Known as “The Being of Willpower.”
It sleeps at the bottom of a lake
to keep the world in balance.

name: dialga
summary:
It has the power to control time.
It appears in Sinnoh-region myths
as an ancient deity.

name: palkia
summary:
It has the ability to distort
space. It is described as a deity
in Sinnoh-region mythology.

name: heatran
summary:
It dwells in volcanic caves. It
digs in with its cross-shaped feet
to crawl on ceilings and walls.

name: regigigas
summary:
There is an enduring legend that
states this Pokémon towed
continents with ropes.

name: cresselia
summary:
Shiny particles are released from
its wings like a veil. It is said
to represent the crescent moon.

name: phione
summary:
It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it
was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

name: manaphy
summary:
Born on a cold seafloor, it
will swim great distances to
return to its birthplace.

name: darkrai
summary:
It can lull people to sleep and
make them dream. It is active
during nights of the new moon.
